data.description: Excessive tobacco glorification or promotion, any marijuana consumption/use, legal drug and alcohol induced intoxication, discussions of illegal drugs.
data.name: Drugs, Intoxication, or Excessive Tobacco Use

data.description: Participating in online or in-person gambling, poker or fantasy sports, that involve the exchange of real money.
data.name: Gambling

data.description: Games that are rated Mature or less suitable for a younger audience.
data.name: Mature-rated game

data.description: Prolonged, and repeated use of obscenities, profanities, and vulgarities, especially as a regular part of speech.
data.name: Significant Profanity or Vulgarity

data.description: Content that focuses on sexualized physical attributes and activities, sexual topics, or experiences.
data.name: Sexual Themes

data.description: Simulations and/or depictions of realistic violence, gore, extreme injury, or death.
data.name: Violent and Graphic Depictions
